body_html:
👍
When I get your latest reply ,I have tried copy the source code from concat_lib_cpu.cc to my own code，
it do works~
After I see your reply，I tried build with --config=monolithic ，it also works~
I ended up choosing the copy code method to prevent unknown changes of the dependent code

thank you very much！！

body:
:+1: 
When I get your latest reply ,I have tried copy the source code from concat_lib_cpu.cc to my own code，
it do works~
After I see your reply，I tried build with  --config=monolithic ，it also works~
I ended up choosing the copy code  method to prevent unknown changes of the dependent code

thank you very much！！
